committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: To guarantee the borrowing efforts of American states, municipalities, school districts, and other local tax levying entities, prior to guaranteeing loans of any foreign borrowing entity, especially foreign governments and foreign central banks.

summary.text: Requires the Government, within each fiscal year, to guarantee the borrowing efforts of American States, municipalities, school districts, and other local tax levying entities prior to guaranteeing loans of any foreign borrowing entity.

titles.title: To guarantee the borrowing efforts of American states, municipalities, school districts, and other local tax levying entities, prior to guaranteeing loans of any foreign borrowing entity, especially foreign governments and foreign central banks.
